table.name: berli_google_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `berli_google_settings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `google_username` varchar(16) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `google_password` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `google_api_id` varchar(400) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `type` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

table.name: vtiger_google_oauth2
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_google_oauth2` ( `service` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `access_token` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `refresh_token` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`service`,`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

table.name: vtiger_google_sync_fieldmapping
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_google_sync_fieldmapping` ( `vtiger_field` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `google_field` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `google_field_type` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `google_custom_label` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `user` int(11) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_google_sync
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_google_sync` ( `googlemodule` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `user` int(10) NOT NULL, `synctime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `lastsynctime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`googlemodule`,`user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

table.name: vtiger_google_sync_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_google_sync_settings` ( `user` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `module` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `clientgroup` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `direction` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `user` (`user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
